mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS day, COUNT(*) AS count FROM mry_member where delete_flag=0 and DATE (create_time) between DATE (#{beginTime}) AND DATE (#{endTime}) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
select province as name, count(*) as count from mry_member where delete_flag=0 and has_bind_device=1 GROUP BY province
select count(1) from mry_product where delete_flag = 0
select count(d.id) from mry_device d, mry_member_device_relation md where d.id = md.device_id
